mapper.select:
select
from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id=m.id left join sys_role_user ru on rm.role_id=ru.role_id where m.del_flag!=1 and ru.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
